name: Doodle
about: Doodle is a complete art tool to help bring out your inner artist.

features.heading: Express yourself without limits!
features.subheading: With its easy-to-use and intuitive design, Doodle is the perfect addition to your art toolbox.

list.name: Powerful Toolbox
list.about: Choose between a number of brush sizes and colors, easily draw basic geometric shapes, set fill and stroke colors.

list.name: Save Projects
list.about: Doodles can be saved and loaded from device memory. You can continue working on a saved project later, or load an base image from Gallery.

list.name: Share Doodles
list.about: Effortlessly share your drawings with friends on social media or send to another device, right from inside the app.

list.name: Distraction-Free
list.about: Doodle allows you to focus on your project by providing an option to hide unnecessary controls while you are working.
